name: EL TORO (MS Paint Game Jam)
description:
PUT ON A SHOW

FIGHT THE BULL

DIE BY THE HORNS

-Instructions (Controls)

WASD to move

Left Click to shake your cape

Right click to dodge or roll while moving

-Instructions (The Game Itself)

Shake your cape to anger the bull, the longer you shake, the more angry the bull gets; the more angry the bull gets, the faster he charges at you.

The closer you get to the bull times the faster it charges the more applause/points you get. I assume you understand how points work.
